<toolkit:DatePicker Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="1" SelectedDateFormat="MyOwn" SelectedDate="{Binding Mode=TwoWay, UpdateSourceTrigger=PropertyChanged, XPath=dayFromSite}"/>
